description:
"I'm ready for action. Let's do it!" Chris said as he was sitting next to Greg.

Chris, our self-described "meathead" wrestler was all buffed out, with a "deer-caught-in-the-headlights" look like he wasn't sure what was going to happen. But he knew!

I was excited because Chris' virgin ass was about to get fucked! Greg had a little bit of fucking experience under his belt and seemed pretty calm.

The most surprising thing about this video is that Chris was popping a boner all over the place while Greg fucked him. The dick doesn't lie!

It was also fun to see Greg's low-hanging nuts bouncing all over the place!
title: Chris & Greg
